trans-unit.source: Adds transactional capability when adding a new item to a collection.
trans-unit.target: 将新项添加到集合时，请添加事务性功能。

trans-unit.source: The ICancelAddNew interface enables a collection to add a new item in an extensible way.
trans-unit.target: ICancelAddNew 接口允许在一种可扩展的方法中添加新项的集合。

trans-unit.source: The new item subsequently can be committed or rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 新项随后可以提交或回滚。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A> method of the collection is used to tentatively add the item, which is subsequently transacted through the following operations: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICancelAddNew.EndNew%2A> method will explicitly commit the pending addition.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A>集合的方法用于接触的临时添加该项目，随后事务性通过执行以下操作:-<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICancelAddNew.EndNew%2A>方法显式提交挂起的添加。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICancelAddNew.EndNew%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Performing another collection operation, such as an insertion, removal, or move will implicitly commit the pending addition.
trans-unit.target: -执行另一个集合操作，如插入、 移除或移动时，将隐式提交挂起的添加。

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICancelAddNew.CancelNew%2A> method will roll back the pending addition if it has not already been committed.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICancelAddNew.CancelNew%2A>方法将回滚挂起的新如果它尚未提交。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICancelAddNew.CancelNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In some scenarios, such as Windows Forms complex data binding, the collection may receive <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICancelAddNew.CancelNew%2A> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICancelAddNew.EndNew%2A> calls for items other than the newly added item.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 集合可能会收到某些情况下，Windows 窗体复杂数据绑定，例如<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICancelAddNew.CancelNew%2A>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICancelAddNew.EndNew%2A>调用以外的新添加的项的项。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICancelAddNew.EndNew%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ICancelAddNew.CancelNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: (Each item is typically a row in a data view.) Ignore these calls; cancel or commit the new item only when that item's index is specified.
trans-unit.target: （每个项通常是数据视图中的一行。）忽略这些调用异步方法。取消或提交新的项，仅当指定该项的索引。

trans-unit.source: There are two models that allow transactional addition of an item to a data-bound collection: - The older model relies directly on a collection that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface and is data-bound directly using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager?displayProperty=fullName> class.
trans-unit.target: 有两种允许事务添加到数据绑定集合的项的模型:-旧模型直接依赖于集合可实现的<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>接口，并且是数据密集型直接使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager?displayProperty=fullName>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.AddNew%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.EndCurrentEdit%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager?displayProperty=fullName> class are responsible for transactional support for adding new items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.AddNew%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.EndCurrentEdit%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager?displayProperty=fullName>类负责以便将新项添加的事务支持。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.EndCurrentEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.AddNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, this functionality depends upon the items supporting transactional behavior through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: 但是，此功能取决于支持通过事务行为的项<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>接口。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: If the items do not support this interface, the item will always be added to the list, regardless of subsequent calls to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果项不支持此接口，将始终将项添加到列表中，而不考虑到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit%2A>的后续调用

trans-unit.source: - The newer model supports a more robust data-binding scenario through the generic <xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601> class, which implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> and ICancelAddNew interfaces.
trans-unit.target: -较新的模型支持更可靠的数据绑定方案，通过泛型<xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601>类，该类实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>和 ICancelAddNew 接口。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the transactional support is managed by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601> collection directly.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，事务的支持由<xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601>集合直接。</xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601>

trans-unit.source: Discards a pending new item from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 丢弃集合中挂起的新项。

trans-unit.source: The CancelNew method rolls back a pending addition (<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A>) of an item previously added to the collection at position `itemIndex`.
trans-unit.target: CancelNew 方法回滚挂起的新 (<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A>) 之前添加到集合中位置的项`itemIndex`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index parameter is necessary because several new items can be simultaneously pending.
trans-unit.target: 索引参数是必需的因为几个新项可能同时挂起。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item that was previously added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 之前已添加到集合的项的索引。

trans-unit.source: Commits a pending new item to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 向集合提交挂起的新项。

trans-unit.source: The EndNew commits a pending addition (<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A>) of an item previously added to the collection at position `itemIndex`.
trans-unit.target: EndNew 提交挂起的新 (<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A>) 之前添加到集合中位置的项`itemIndex`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index parameter is necessary because several new items can be simultaneously pending.
trans-unit.target: 索引参数是必需的因为几个新项可能同时挂起。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item that was previously added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 之前已添加到集合的项的索引。
